name: BULLETRAIN (valentinohp, raiizgaming, myticalcat)
description:
Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys: Move around
Your train will shoot automatically to nearest enemy in sight

Description:

This is an endless runner fused with bullet hell game where you control a train that can fight back. But since the enemies will be enormous in number... you better watch your back! Move around with WASD or Arrow Keys, you can move freely between rails. The longer you can stay alive, the more scores you can gain. The game will be over when your HP reaches zero.

Premise:

You are a machinist who drives a train that carries consumption for the evacuation of residents in a desert area, where the train is being chased by an evil organization that wants to thwart the delivery of the consumption.

Source Code:

https://github.com/valentinohp/project-tbh
